    TEXT:
    Better late than never!

    I met with Christa, and think we are basically on track now.   Somehow I
    need to figure out how to pull her into event action sooner, and keep
    myself more out of it.  We'll both be better off that way.==================== ATTAC

                                         Education Strategy Meeting
                                                  May 19

                                                   Agenda


         Testing Initiative
         1. Strategy for Next Goodling Amendment

         2. NAGB -- options

         3. Civil Rights GroupslBilingual issue

         4. Outreach for Constituency Groups

         5. State outreachlNGA Exec. MeetinglNGA Endorsement

         6. Urban outreach

         Budget Update
         1. Review of agreement

         2. Rollout activities

         3. Appropriations issues
